Dear %firstName%,

Your application for %jobTitle% at %companyName% has been submitted. For your own record, we attached the CV you handed in.

Please find a copy of your application message below:

%applicationMessage%

What happens next?

We will review your application and contact you directly in case of questions.

Thank you for using Transport Talent and good luck with your application.

Kind regards,

Your team at Transport Talent
